messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Easter & Passover.
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s easy to fix.  Just celebrate Canadian Thanksgiving . . . second Monday in October.   Tia No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
messages.messageBody:
>Funny, Bob. i know what you mean. Jewish holidays always change and this
>year is awful!! Hannukah starts the day after Thanksgiving! Really. I
>protest...

That's easy to fix. Just celebrate Canadian Thanksgiving . . . second
Monday in October. <g>
Tia


No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt

messages.subject: Easter & Passover.
messages.msgSnippet: Funny, Bob. i know what you mean. Jewish holidays always change and this year is awful!! Hannukah starts the day after Thanksgiving! Really. I protest... Well,
messages.messageBody:
Funny, Bob. i know what you mean. Jewish holidays always change and this
year is awful!! Hannukah starts the day after Thanksgiving! Really. I
protest...

Well, at least I can just relax later in the month and do nothing but
whatever I want to on vacation time. Hmm.. maybe I'll go on a Caribbean
cruise.

Debbie
